section.p: You crouch at the edge of the lake and skim a couple of flat stones towards the needles. Ripples spread across the surface of the water. For a moment, nothing happens. Looking down, you see a cloud of blood-red silt kicked up from the bottom of the pool., and a writhing shape within it. A dragon-shaped head and snake-like body shoot up from the water like a fountain.

The creature, a water drake, opens its mouth and a high pressure jet of water knocks you off your feet - lose
one die of Stamina
(but subtract your armour bonus, if any, from this). You crouch behind a boulder to make the worm slither out and fight you.
If you lose, . If you win, .

choices.choice: Swim out to one of the needles
